title: Jax Chroma case
body: I was wondering throught the league's store, and came acrossed jax's chroma case. i saw it cost only 590 RP, but that was after i had nemesis on my account. and riot didnt alarted me that... so i refunded the nemesis jax skin (i bought it when he was at 30% discount - 682 RP) and when i came back to buy the chroma case, it showed me it cost 1590. Now, i dont ask the chroma case on 590 as i thought it would be, i only ask for 30% discount on nemsis jax so i can  buy it again. (i have 750 RP now). help anyone?

replies.body:
Hey Levir7,

That's correct - if you own the Nemesis skin, the chroma pack would be priced at 590 RP. 

If you had refunded the skin, you would need to purchase the skin again in order to pick up the chroma pack as well. Unfortunately, you'll only be able to purchase Nemesis Jax at the current price, and we won't be able to accommodate the discount you had originally purchased the skin at.
